summary:
Four Monk Robes & Hoods that are already in the game files but unobtainable.
Colours: Brown, Green, Grey and Red.
The hoods are seperated from the robes (which they weren\'t in the game files).

This means there are 16 combinations of colourful new outfits!

All items are stocked by Radiant Raiment in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
Five Monk Robes & Hoods that are already in the game-files but unobtainable.
Colours: Yellow, Brown, Green, Grey and Red.
The hoods are seperated from the robes (which they weren\'t in the game-files).

This means there are 25 combinations of colourful new outfits!

\"UNFIXABLE\" BUG: The yellow hood has the wrong image when you look at in inventory. Bethesda never made a correct image for it. Presumably it was meant to always go with the robes and never be seperated. It looks correct when worn though!
author: the--dud
